channel.title: Product Hunt 热门
channel.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

item.title: LogoAi - 由人工智能驅動的標誌製作者和品牌自動化平臺
item.description: LogoAi是一個由人工智能驅動的標誌製作者和品牌自動化平臺，可以幫助小企業創建專業的標誌，設計匹配的身份，並通過品牌社交媒體內容實現品牌的自動化推廣。
item.content:encoded: LogoAi is an AI powered logo maker and brand automation platform that can help small businesses create professional logos, design matching identities, and automate brand promotion with on-brand social media content.

item.title: Pains, Gains & Goals - 參與教訓會議的最簡單方法。
item.description: 痛苦、收穫和目標 "的誕生是出於爲現場、混合和完全遠程團隊運行簡單、輕量級的經驗教訓會議的需要。確保所有參與者的聲音被聽到，反饋是安全和匿名的
item.content:encoded: Pains, Gains & Goals was born out of a need to run simple, lightweight lessons learned sessions for in-person, hybrid, and fully remote teams. Ensuring that all participants' voices are heard and that feedback is safe and anonymous!

item.title: SPOOKY Design System - 萬聖節的免費設計系統
item.description: 忘掉南瓜拿鐵吧 🎃👻這個萬聖節得到一個完整的SPOOKY設計系統 🤗 📖開源 🧩17+詭異的Web組件 🎨萬聖節顏色系統 📄出血邊緣的文件 🌚只有黑暗模式 👻詭異的助手 製作你自己的
item.content:encoded: Forget pumpkin latte 🎃👻 this halloween get a full-blown SPOOKY Design System 🤗 📖 Open Source 🧩 17+ spooky Web Components 🎨 Halloween color system 📄 Bleeding-edge documentation 🌚 Dark mode ONLY 👻 Spooky assistant Make your own!

item.title: Sublive - 通過互聯網進行低延遲干擾
item.description: 通過低延遲和高質量的音頻網絡連接世界各地的音樂家，形成一種新的音樂製作方式。不需要特殊的硬件，只需要一臺有互聯網連接的臺式電腦。
item.content:encoded: A new way of making music by connecting musicians all over the world with a low-latency and high-quality audio network. No special hardware is needed, just a desktop computer with an internet connection.

item.title: Draw This Book - 用學習字母的方式學習繪畫
item.description: 本書的前提很簡單：要想在繪畫方面做得更好，最好的辦法就是多畫，多畫。通過描摹、指導、重複和逐步增加難度，你將開始學習並記住基礎知識。
item.content:encoded: The premise of this book is simple: the best way to become better at drawing is to draw, a lot. Through tracing, guides, repetition and incrementally increasing the difficulty, you will begin to learn and remember the basics.

item.title: Katteb - 由AI驅動的一鍵式文案寫作工具
item.description: Katteb是一個由人工智能驅動的寫作夥伴，可以幫助你更好地寫作。 彙編你的想法，並進行創意!
item.content:encoded: Katteb is a writing partner powered by AI that can help you to write better. compile your thoughts, and go creative!

item.title: hasty.dev - 一個JS性能工具
item.description: 每個開發者都有過這樣的經歷，我至少也有過這樣的經歷：我需要一些性能相當好的代碼，但不知道哪一段代碼更快--而我們又該如何測試呢？🤔
item.content:encoded: Every developer has, I have at least, been in the situation, that I needed some quite performant code, but didn't know which piece of code is faster - and how does one even test this? 🤔

item.title: This Shoe does not exist. - AI生成的鞋子設計
item.description: 人工智能生成的鞋子 - 計劃擴大產品，以生成3D模型並使用用戶輸入的信息
item.content:encoded: AI generated shoes - plans for expanding product to generate 3D models and use user input

item.title: SocialBoat - 爲健身創客推出在線工作室的Shopify
item.description: SocialBoat是爲健身創作者推出數字健身工作室的Shopify。在這個空間裏，他們可以舉辦健身挑戰賽、現場教練課程、跟蹤目標並建立一個個人社區。我們希望幫助5千萬創作者實現他們的才能和知識的貨幣化。
item.content:encoded: SocialBoat is Shopify for fitness creators to launch digital fitness studios. In this space, they can host fitness challenges, live coaching sessions, track goals and build a personal community. We want to help 50M creators monetize their talent & knowledge.

item.title: Color Peeker - 菜單欄中的顏色代碼
item.description: Color Peeker是一個實時的數字顏色表，靜靜地坐在你的菜單欄裏。它顯示你的鼠標指針下的顏色的十六進制代碼。你還可以打開 "右鍵複製"，這樣當你右鍵點擊時，顏色代碼就會立即被複制。
item.content:encoded: Color Peeker is a realtime digital color meter that sits quietly in your menu bar. It shows the hex code of the color under your mouse pointer. You can also turn on Copy on Right Click, so that when you right click, the color code is copied immediately.

item.title: dzook app 2.0 version - 把自己變成不同藝術風格的人物!
item.description: dzook將照片轉換成插圖肖像，將視頻轉換成不同藝術風格的動畫。爲了這個萬聖節，我們開發了一個特殊的鏡頭，叫做Zombify，也在Snapchat上出現。試試我們的過濾器，並給我們你的反饋!
item.content:encoded: dzook converts photos into illustrated portraits and videos into animations in different art styles. For this Halloween, we’ve developed a special lens called Zombify which is also featured on Snapchat. Try our filters and give us your feedback!

item.title: Shadow - 在iOS上使用SharePlay的極簡播客應用程序
item.description: Shadow旨在提供一個現代的、輕量級的、簡潔的用戶界面，並有一套小的功能（包括SharePlay），使你能夠享受播客而不妨礙你。
item.content:encoded: Shadow aims to provide a modern, lightweight and clean user interface with a small set of features (including SharePlay) that allow you to enjoy podcasts without getting in the way.

item.title: EazyLoader - 下載變得簡單
item.description: EazyLoader是基於Flask的網絡應用程序，爲你的下載工作提供便利。從YouTube和Instagram下載視頻和圖片，並以最佳的可用質量。除此之外，你還可以以不同的速度計算YouTube播放列表的持續時間。
item.content:encoded: EazyLoader is Flask based web-application built to make downloading easy for you. Download videos and pictures from YouTube and Instagram in the best available quality. In addition to that, you can calculate duration of YouTube Playlist at different speeds.

item.title: Dashana - 在不到一分鐘的時間內將你的數據可視化
item.description: Dashana是一個令人難以置信的簡單工具，幾乎可以從任何地方將實時數據可視化--物聯網、應用程序、服務、表單。不需要編碼或設計。只需推送你的數據，小工具就會立即創建。限時優惠。免費註冊並獲得Dashana PRO。
item.content:encoded: Dashana is incredibly simple tool to visualize realtime data from almost anywhere - IoT, Apps, Services, Sheets. No need for coding or design. Simply push your data and widgets are created instantly. Limited time offer. Register for FREE and get Dashana PRO.

item.title: Lykeion - 關於宏觀、加密貨幣、影響和地緣政治的金融通訊
item.description: 我們是一套涵蓋宏觀、市場、加密貨幣、可持續發展和地緣政治等交叉領域的新聞通訊。我們是機構質量，但我們保持輕鬆和可消化。我們是客觀的，非部落主義的，並努力享受自己。
item.content:encoded: We're a suite of newsletters that cover the intersection of macro, markets, crypto, sustainability, and geopolitics. We're institutional quality, but we keep it light and digestible. We're objective, non-tribalistic, and try to enjoy ourselves.

item.title: PMInterview - 練習產品管理面試問題
item.description: 100+免費PM面試問題 獲取Uber、Google、Amazon、Swiggy、Flipkart、CRED等產品經理面試的問題解決方案
item.content:encoded: 100+ Free PM Interview Questions Get solution of questions asked in Uber, Google, Amazon, Swiggy, Flipkart, CRED etc. product manager interviews

item.title: The Closet by Aww, Rats! - 美特維爾中最時尚的房間
item.description: 衣櫥是一個dApp，在這裏你可以用各種季節性的衣服和配飾來裝扮Aww, Rats中的老鼠。想想看，Able Sisters Clothing是爲非真菌性老鼠設計的。
item.content:encoded: The closet is a dApp where you can dress up the rats from Aww, Rats in a variety of seasonal clothes and accessories. Think Able Sisters Clothing for non-fungible rats.

item.title: Vector Ink - 創新的在線矢量設計軟件
item.description: 用Vector Inks的直觀設計工具輕鬆地設計矢量圖。Vector Ink使矢量圖形設計變得非常容易。最好的部分! 它是一個響應式的、基於雲的應用程序，你可以隨時隨地在任何設備上使用。
item.content:encoded: Effortlessly design vector graphics with Vector Inks intuitive design tools. Vector Ink makes vector graphic design really easy. Best part! It’s a responsive, cloud based app that you can use anytime, anywhere, and on any device.

item.title: Notion Starter Pack - 快速而簡單地開始使用Notion
item.description: Notion是一個偉大的工具，可以做很多事情。不費吹灰之力就可以開始利用Notion的優勢。
item.content:encoded: Notion is a great tool for many things. Start taking advantage of Notion without effort.

item.title: Kopier - 爲您經常分享的個人資料鏈接提供快速撥號
item.description: Kopier讓你存儲你經常分享的資料鏈接，並通過快捷方式快速訪問它們。添加無限的鏈接與自定義鍵盤快捷鍵，100%永久免費。
item.content:encoded: Kopier lets you store your frequently shared profile links and access them lightning fast with shortcuts. Add unlimited links with custom keyboard shortcuts 100% free forever.

item.title: Airgram for Google Meet & Zoom - 重新構想你的在線會議體驗
item.description: 減少分心，提高生產力 - 🎃 Google Meet 和 Zoom 的實時轉錄 🎃 發言人檢測 🎃 帶時間戳的協作筆記 🎃 視頻錄製（1080p） 🎃 GMeet 的 Chrome 擴展 🎃 谷歌日曆、Slack 集成
item.content:encoded: Less distraction, more productivity - 🎃 Live transcription for Google Meet & Zoom 🎃 Speaker detection 🎃 Collaborative notes w/ timestamps 🎃 Video recording (1080p) 🎃 Chrome extension for GMeet 🎃 Google Calendar, Slack integration

item.title: SendgoMail - 免費的電子郵件發送變得簡單而實惠
item.description: Sendgomail是一個值得信賴的DIY電子郵件營銷工具，當各種客戶需要發送電子郵件活動時，他們無需擔心安裝電子郵件軟件。
item.content:encoded: Sendgomail is a trusted DIY email marketing tool with various clients when they need to send email campaigns without worrying about installing email software.

item.title: Weekrise Beta - 一個沒有雜亂無章的每週任務日曆
item.description: 一個設計整齊的每週任務日曆。在桌面和移動網絡設備上都很好用。
item.content:encoded: A neatly designed weekly task calendar. Works great on both desktop and mobile web devices.

item.title: Zolve - 從任何地方申請美國銀行賬戶和美國信用卡
item.description: 這並不是真正的時間旅行，但是有了Zolve，你甚至可以在踏入美國之前就申請美國銀行賬戶和美國信用卡!
item.content:encoded: It’s not really time travel, but with Zolve you can apply for a U.S. bank account & U.S. Credit Card even before you set foot in America!

item.title: Remote3 - 遠程web3工作
item.description: 尋找遠程web3工作，在任何地方從事網絡的未來工作。
item.content:encoded: Find remote web3 jobs, work on the future of the web from anywhere.

item.title: abrief - 讓視頻製作者的生活更輕鬆
item.description: 🙋🏽♀️你是否發現自己花了幾個小時來發現客戶想要什麼樣的視頻廣告？這一點現在改變了。📝讓你的客戶爲你提供更好的簡報 🎥把時間花在能產生價值的任務上 🚀滿足客戶的期望
item.content:encoded: 🙋🏽‍♀️ Do you find yourself spending hours to discover what kind of video commercial your customer wants? That changes now. 📝 Let your client provide you with a better brief 🎥 Spend time on the tasks that generate value 🚀 Meet client's expectations

item.title: Mother Nature Dying - 驚心動魄的萬聖節音頻體驗，讓人毛骨悚然。
item.description: 收聽一次物種事件，自然母親的死亡。在我們的iOS和安卓應用程序上聆聽我們正在消亡的星球的令人不安的聲音。一個令人毛骨悚然的萬聖節音頻體驗，讓你自己、朋友和追隨者感到震驚，重新考慮我們的生活方式。
item.content:encoded: Tune into a once-in-a-species event, Mother Nature dying. Listen to the haunting sounds of our dying planet on our iOS and Android apps. A harrowing Halloween audio experience to spook and shock yourself, friends and followers to reconsider our lifestyles.

item.title: Cleanshot - 從任何網站的URL生成乾淨的屏幕截圖
item.description: 用Cleanshot爲任何網站創建無憂無慮的瀏覽器模擬圖。只需粘貼鏈接並下載屏幕截圖。
item.content:encoded: Create hassle-free browser mockups for any website with Cleanshot. Just paste the link and download the screenshot.

item.title: MetaJoke - 在Twitter上瘋傳的元笑話
item.description: "笑話即服務 "產品😂，提供與Facebook改名爲Meta有關的笑話。有5分鐘時間嗎？⌚ -訪問Metaisajoke.xyz -翻閱烤 "Meta "的推文 -大笑5分鐘 -繼續你可愛的一天!
item.content:encoded: "Joke as a service" product 😂 that delivers jokes related to the re-branding of Facebook to Meta. Have 5 mins time? ⌚ -Visit Metaisajoke.xyz -Scroll through tweets roasting "Meta" -Laugh for 5 mins -Carry on with your lovely day!

item.title: Ship SaaS - 高級Next.js和Supabase SaaS入門套件
item.description: 這個入門套件包括你快速建立SaaS應用程序所需的所有集成！你將在一週內擁有一個完整的應用程序，包括登陸頁面、註冊和計費功能。你將在一週內擁有一個完整的應用程序，包括登陸頁面、登錄、註冊和計費功能。這是開始使用Next.js和Supabase的最簡單方法。
item.content:encoded: This starter kit includes all the integrations you need to build a SaaS app fast! You'll have a complete app with landing page, login, registration, and billing functionality ready in under a week. It's the easiest way to get started with Next.js and Supabase.

item.title: MeetFox - 通過簡化的預訂工具將會議變成交易
item.description: MeetFox是一個多合一的解決方案，旨在發展您的業務。管理您的個人和團隊日程表，通過一個旨在轉換線索的登陸頁面預訂更多的會議，運行現場和在線會議，並通過無縫的客戶體驗給客戶留下深刻印象。
item.content:encoded: MeetFox is an all-in-one solution built to grow your business. Manage your personal and team schedule, book more meetings with a landing page designed to convert leads, run in-person and online meetings, and impress clients with a seamless customer experience.

item.title: VC Watcher - 不費吹灰之力就能瞭解頂級風險投資公司的投資情況
item.description: 每週一封電子郵件，總結Peter Thiel、Naval Ravikant或Keith Rabois等頂級風險投資人的近期投資。
item.content:encoded: A weekly email that summarizes recent investments made by top VCs like Peter Thiel, Naval Ravikant, or Keith Rabois.

item.title: PullContacts - 在幾分鐘內提取聯繫信息
item.description: 快速而簡單的電子郵件地址、電話號碼和社交媒體鏈接搜刮器。在一個URL中搜索電子郵件、電話號碼和社會鏈接。
item.content:encoded: Quick and easy email address, phone number and social media link scraper. Search for Emails, Phone Numbers and Social Links within a URL.

item.title: Blueprint - 你的民主捐贈的影響之家
item.description: 藍圖幫助捐助者對民主黨候選人和公民組織進行有效的全年投資。用戶可以獲得季度捐贈建議，跟蹤捐贈和影響，下載表格進行離線捐贈，並要求定製組合。
item.content:encoded: Blueprint helps donors make effective, year-round investments in Democratic candidates and civic organizations. Users can get quarterly giving recommendations, track contributions and impact, download forms to donate offline, and request custom portfolios.

item.title: Connect.Club 2.0 - 在Metaverse建立社交網絡，實現真正的人際聯繫
item.description: 歡迎來到Metaverse，這是一個聰明的交流場所。就像在現實生活中的活動一樣，在虛擬中認識真實的人。來參觀我們的節日 "未來產品 "和Metaverse畫廊。期待關於如何設計全新產品的專題討論會。
item.content:encoded: Welcome to the Metaverse, a smart place for networking. Virtually meet real people just like at events in real life. Come visit our festival Products of the Future and the Metaverse Gallery. Expect engaging panels on how to design the all-new products.

item.title: VirtualCoffee by Trivia - 介紹隊友，打破僵局，並在Slack中進行社交。
item.description: 遠程工作剝奪了你在休息室的戲謔？錯過了八卦、笑話和幻想聯盟的戰略討論？好吧，別擔心! VirtualCoffee幫助你在屏幕之外參與，使你能夠與你的隊友聯繫並更好地瞭解他們。
item.content:encoded: Remote work depriving you of your break room banter? Miss the gossip, jokes, and fantasy league strategy discussions? Well, fret not! VirtualCoffee helps you engage beyond your screens, enabling you to connect with your teammates and get to know them better.

item.title: IconKitchen - 爲任何平臺製作應用程序圖標
item.description: IconKitchen是一種快速的新方法，可以快速設計各種平臺的應用程序圖標，從iOS到Android（自適應圖標）到Web（favicons和更多）和macOS！選擇一些顏色和紋理以及剪貼畫或自己的圖像，就可以完成。選擇一些顏色、紋理和剪貼畫或你自己的圖像，你就可以完成了
item.content:encoded: IconKitchen is a fast new way to quickly design app icons across a variety of platforms, from iOS to Android (adaptive icons) to web (favicons and more) and macOS! Choose some colors, textures, and clipart or your own image and you're done!

item.title: Mainvest - 小企業的投資市場
item.description: 發現美國各地真實的實體小企業中的被動收入投資。加入一個投資者社區，只需100美元就能獲得10-25%的目標收益，並通過一個新興的資產類別使你的投資組合多樣化。
item.content:encoded: Discover passive income investments in real brick and mortar small businesses across America. Join a community of investors accessing 10-25% target returns with as little as $100 and diversify your portfolio with an emerging asset class.

item.title: Facebook Reports by Porter - 無代碼的Facebook頁面報告，包括模板
item.description: 在Google Data Studio上從任何Facebook頁面創建Facebook報告：你的或你的競爭對手。適用於社會媒體和內容營銷人員，幫助他們自動進行社會媒體審計、社會媒體白標報告、內容和競爭研究。
item.content:encoded: Create Facebook reports on Google Data Studio from any Facebook page: yours or your competitors. For social media and content marketers to help them automate social media audits, social media white-label reports, content, and competitive research.

item.title: Doneit 2.0 - 開始更快速地完成你的所有任務
item.description: 認識一下Doneit，這是一個功能豐富的日常計劃表，專注於簡化和組織。有了Doneit，你不需要擔心你的任務清單會變得混亂，因爲它的設計是爲了幫助你更好地組織你所有的日常事務。
item.content:encoded: Meet Doneit, a feature packed daily planner that focuses on simplicity and organization. With Doneit, you don't need to worry about your tasks lists ever being messy because it was designed to help you better organize all of your daily to-do's.

item.title: Cluey Consumer - 通過你的日常採購產生更大的影響
item.description: Cluey是一個網絡平臺和Chrome擴展程序，顯示你購買的品牌對人👥、地球🌎和政治🗳️的影響，並建議與你個人價值觀更一致的替代品。
item.content:encoded: Cluey is a web platform & Chrome extension that shows the impact the brands you buy have on people 👥, the planet 🌎 and politics 🗳️ and suggests alternatives that are better aligned with your personal values.

item.title: Crowdsourced Technical Docs by Almanac - 讓任何人對技術和社區文檔提出修改建議
item.description: 大多數公共文件如果沒有持續的努力就會變質，而Almanac可以讓你從你的社區中衆包改進。讀者可以在分支上提出修改建議，這些建議可以被合併進來，有效地將你的公共網頁變成 "活的文檔"。
item.content:encoded: While most public docs go stale without constant effort, Almanac lets you crowdsource improvements from your community. Readers can suggest changes on branches, which can be merged in, effectively turning your public pages into "living documentation."

item.title: CloudGraph - 用於AWS的GraphQL API
item.description: CloudGraph是一個免費的、開源的、以GraphQL爲動力的搜索引擎，用於你的AWS基礎設施。CloudGraph使雲計算工程師能夠輕鬆地編寫GraphQL查詢，以解決安全、合規、治理、資產庫存和成本問題。
item.content:encoded: CloudGraph is a free and open-source GraphQL-powered search engine for your AWS infrastructure. CloudGraph makes it easy for cloud engineers to write GraphQL queries in order to solve security, compliance, governance, asset inventory, and cost problems.

item.title: The Coin Project - 推出你自己的創作者幣並使獨家內容盈利
item.description: 推出你的創作者幣，提供獨家內容，並將粉絲變成投資者。推出你自己的創造者幣，不需要任何技術努力。通過出售獨家內容賺錢。看着你的硬幣價格升值，因爲越來越多的粉絲購買你的硬幣並在上面交易。
item.content:encoded: Launch your creator coin, offer exclusive content, and turn fans into investors. Launch your own creator coin with no technical effort. Make money by selling exclusive content. Watch your coin price appreciate as more fans buy your coin and trade on it.

item.title: VideoDuke 2.0 - 從YouTube、Facebook、Instagram和TikTok下載視頻
item.description: 一個媒體下載器，可以從幾乎所有的流媒體服務中加載視頻，提取音頻，甚至從Instagram中保存圖片。與播放列表兼容。可以切換到高級模式，它可以瀏覽並列出給定頁面上的任何可下載資源。
item.content:encoded: A media downloader that can load videos from almost any streaming service, extract audio, and even save images from Instagram. Compatible with playlists. Can be switched to Advanced Mode, which can browse and list any downloadable resources on a given page.

item.title: Free Design Templates from Zeroqode - 25+ 鼓舞人心的PSD和Sketch網頁設計模板
item.description: 一個免費的PSD和Sketch格式的網頁設計模板集。這些設計是由我們的頂級無代碼應用程序模板轉換而來，適用於Bubble。
item.content:encoded: A free collection of web design templates in PSD & Sketch format. These designs are converted from our top no-code app templates for Bubble.

item.title: Galactic Camera - 通過簡單的個性化和效果使視頻變得有趣
item.description: 銀河系相機使溝通變得可視化，讓你輕鬆地定製你的視頻，以反映你的個性和心情。⠀ 它還爲元空間做好了準備--我們可以很好地與web3玩耍。 炫耀你的NFT，在屏幕上分享你的ENS域，還有更多
item.content:encoded: Galactic Camera makes communication visual and lets you easily customize your video to reflect your personality and mood. ⠀ It’s also metaverse ready—we play nicely with web3. Show off your NFTs, share your ENS domain on screen, and more!

item.title: Xantos Labs - 爲世界上任何人提供積極的投資平臺
item.description: Xantos Labs是一個積極的投資平臺，管理你的資金，這樣你就不必去管理。獲得一個管理賬戶，通過低費用和機構質量的服務，毫不費力地像1%的人一樣進行投資，這是爲普通人考慮的。
item.content:encoded: Xantos Labs is an active investment platform that manages your money so that you don’t have to. Get a managed account and effortlessly invest like the 1% with low-fee & institutional-quality service built with everyday folk in mind.

item.title: Scary Senders - 檢測你的電子郵件中的詭異的間諜像素
item.description: 在你的電子郵件中跟蹤像素和打開跟蹤是很詭異的👻，這就是爲什麼我們在https://getsendstack.com 創建了一個有趣和易於使用的電子郵件掃描儀，讓你分析你的任何電子郵件。只要轉發它們，你就能在一秒鐘內看到結果。
item.content:encoded: Tracking pixels and open tracking in your emails are spooky 👻 That’s why we at https://getsendstack.com created a fun and easy-to-use email scanner to let you analyze any of your emails. Just forward them and you'll see the result in a second.

item.title: Storipress - 一體化的網絡博客+發佈平臺
item.description: 首個低代碼CMS，將內容、設計和編輯團隊聚集在一起，創建可擴展的專業出版物。Storipress擁有世界上最快的主機，無論你是一個單獨的博客還是《紐約時報》，它都能與你一起擴展。
item.content:encoded: The first low-code CMS that brings content, design & editorial teams together to create professional publications that scale. And with the world's fastest hosting, Storipress scales with you whether you are a solo blogger or the New York Times.
